name: Stickman 3D Crossbow
description:
The crossbow war has begin! A stick man is only as strong as his Crossbow, so it’s time to run and shoot to get revenge on your stickman enemies and cure your anger! Hours of killing await! - Did we mention there are crossbows and stickmen? : )

Features:
• Easy controls for maximum killing!
• Best stickman crossbow game
• Many 3D levels
• 3D stickman and enemies
• Internet not required for playing
• 100% FREE!
